original_text:
He will receive blessing from the Lord
    and righteousness from the God of his salvation.
korean_text: 그는 여호와께 복을 받고 구원의 하나님께 공의를 얻으리니

sentences.original_text: He will receive blessing from the Lord
and righteousness from the God of his salvation.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 구원의 하나님께 의를 받을 것입니다.
